PaymentAddress.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The PaymentAddress interface of the Payment Request API is used to store shipping or payment address information.

remarks.para: It may be useful to refer to the Universal Postal Union website's Addressing S42 standard materials, which provide information about international standards for postal addresses.

PaymentAddressCity.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The city read-only property of
the interface returns a string containing the city or
town portion of the address.
PaymentAddressCity.value:
A string indicating the city or town portion of the address described
by the object.

PaymentAddressAddressLine.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The addressLine read-only
property of the interface is an array of
strings, each specifying a line of the address that is not
covered by one of the other properties of PaymentAddress.

remarks.para:
These
lines may include the street name, house number, apartment number, rural delivery route,
descriptive instructions, or post office box.

PaymentAddressAddressLine.value:
An array of strings, each containing one line of the address.
For example, the addressLine array for the Mozilla Space in London would
have the following entries:
IndexaddressLine[] value
0Metal Box Factory
1Suite 441, 4th floor
230 Great Guildford StreetThese, combined with additional values for other properties of the
, would represent the full address, which is:Mozilla
Metal Box Factory
Suite 441, 4th floor
30 Great Guildford Street
London SE1 0HS
United Kingdom

PaymentAddressCountry.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The country read-only property of the
interface is a string identifying the address's country
using the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard. The string is
always in its canonical upper-case form.

remarks.para:
Some examples of valid country values: "US",
"GB", "CN", or "JP".

PaymentAddressRecipient.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The read-only recipient property of the
interface returns a string containing the name of the
recipient, purchaser, or contact person at the payment address.
PaymentAddressRecipient.value:
A string giving the name of the person receiving or paying for the
purchase, or the name of a contact person in other contexts. If no name is available,
this string is empty.

PaymentAddressOrganization.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The organization read-only
property of the interface returns a string containing
the name of the organization, firm, company, or institution at the address.
PaymentAddressOrganization.value:
A string whose value is the name of the organization or company
located at the address described by the PaymentAddress object. This should
be the name of the organization that is to receive the shipment for shipping addresses,
or which is responsible for payment addresses.

PaymentAddressSortingCode.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The sortingCode read-only property of the
interface returns a string containing a postal sorting
code such as is used in France.
PaymentAddressSortingCode.value: A string containing the sorting code portion of the address.

PaymentAddressDependentLocality.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The read-only dependentLocality
property of the interface is a string containing a
sublocality designation within a city, such as a neighborhood, borough, district, or,
in the United Kingdom, a dependent locality. Also known as a post
town.
PaymentAddressDependentLocality.value:
A string indicating the sublocality portion of the address. This may
be an empty string if no sublocality is available or required. It's used to provide
disambiguation when a city may include areas that duplicate street namesA sublocality is an area within a city, such as a neighborhood, borough, or district.
In the United Kingdom, this is used to indicate the post town in the
United Kingdom (known officially by the Royal Mail as the dependent
locality). This is a disambiguating feature of addresses in places where a
city may have areas that duplicate street names.

PaymentAddressPhone.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The read-only phone property of the
interface returns a string containing the telephone number
of the recipient or contact person.
PaymentAddressPhone.value:
A string containing the telephone number for the recipient of the
shipment or of the responsible party for payment. If no phone number is available, this
value is an empty string.

PaymentAddressPostalCode.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The postalCode read-only property of the
interface returns a string containing a code used by a
jurisdiction for mail routing, for example, the ZIP Code
in the United States or the Postal Index Number (PIN code)
in India.
PaymentAddressPostalCode.value:
A string which contains the postal code portion of the address. A
postal code is a string (either numeric or alphanumeric) which is used by a postal
service to optimize mail routing and delivery.Various countries use different terms for this. In most of the world, it's known as the
"post code" or "postal code." In the United States, the ZIP code is used. India uses PIN
codes.

PaymentAddressRegion.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The read-only region property of the
interface returns a string containing the top-level
administrative subdivision of the country in which the address is located. For example,
this may be a state, province, oblast, or prefecture.
PaymentAddressRegion.value:
A string specifying the top-level administrative subdivision within
the country in which the address is located. This region has different names in
different countries, such as: state, province, oblast, prefecture, or county.

PaymentAddressToJSON.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The toJSON() method of the interface is a standard serializer that returns a JSON representation of the PaymentAddress object's properties.
